thread.title: Papa John's Pizza Delivers For A Good Cause
thread.title_full: Papa John's Pizza Delivers For A Good Cause - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Papa John's Pizza Delivers For A Good Cause
text:
Papa Johnâ€™s
Derek Holland Deal Raises $27,500 for 60 Feet 6 and the Texas Rangers Baseball Foundation
DALLAS , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- It's a home run for a good cause thanks to fans of Papa John's and the Texas Rangers. Throughout the 2015 regular season, Papa John's offered fans two large one-topping pizzas for $16.60 . Each time fans entered promo code HOLLAND, Papa John's donated $1.60 to the Texas Rangers Baseball Foundation and 60 Feet 6, the foundation founded by Ranger's pitcher Derek Holland .
Collectively, fans scored more than $27,500 for the organizations. The Papa John's donation will support the Texas Rangers Baseball Foundation's youth initiatives and fight pediatric leukemia through 60 Feet 6.
"60 Feet 6 started because I met a Ranger's fan who was going through leukemia. He taught me a lot about the meaning of life and reminded me of what's really important," said Holland. "This donation honors his memory. Thank you to Papa John's and all the fans for supporting 60 Feet 6 and the Texas Rangers Baseball Foundation."
Papa John's presented the check to the organizations before the regular season finale on October 4 .
"The passion Derek and the Texas Rangers have for their respective organizations is contagious," said Steve McNeil , operations vice president at Papa John's. "We're glad to show our support for their valuable work of improving the lives of children here in our community."
About Papa John's
Headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky, Papa John's International, Inc. (NASDAQ: PZZA) is the world's third largest pizza delivery company. For 13 of the past 15 years, consumers have rated Papa John's No. 1 in customer satisfaction among all national pizza chains in the American Customer Satisfaction Index (ACSI). Papa John's is the Official Pizza Sponsor of the National Football League and Super Bowl XLIX, as well as the Official Pizza of the Dallas Cowboys and the Texas Rangers. For more information about the company or to order pizza online, visit Papa John's at www.papajohns.com .
